om.helper.spellcheck
Class SpellCheckerUtil

java.lang.Object
  om.helper.spellcheck.SpellCheckerUtil

public final class SpellCheckerUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Provides utility methods for spell checking. Uses an open source API Jazzy for spell checking.

addToDictionary

public static void addToDictionary(java.lang.String word)
Adds a word to the spell checker's dictionary.

Parameters:
word - single word

isWordCorrect

public static boolean isWordCorrect(java.lang.String word,
                                    boolean startsSentence)
Checks whether a word spelt correctly or not. This method also checks to see if a misspelt word can be ignored according to the ignore settings.

Parameters:
word - single word for spell check
startsSentence - true if it is the first word in a sentence, used to check mixed case word.
Returns:
true if the word spelt correctly

getSuggestions

public static java.lang.String[] getSuggestions(java.lang.String word)
Takes a misspelt word as an argument and returns an array of suggestions from the dictionary.

Parameters:
word - Misspelt word for suggestions
Returns:
String array of available suggestions from the dictionary

checkAllWords

public static java.lang.String[] checkAllWords(java.lang.String words)
Spell checks all words in the input string and returns an array of misspelt words. Returns an empty array if all the words are correct.

Parameters:
words - String of words for spell check
Returns:
string array of misspelt words

isMixedCaseWord

public static final boolean isMixedCaseWord(java.lang.String word,
                                            boolean startsSentence)
Returns true if this word contains mixed case characters

Parameters:
word - single word for mixed case check
startsSentence - True if this word is at the start of a sentence
Returns:
true if it is amixed case word
